Module roborally
Package game.round

Class LaserAction

java.lang.Object
game.round.LaserAction
public class LaserAction
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the functionality of boardLasers as well as RobotLasers.
Author:
Amulya

      public LaserAction()

  • Method Details

    • calculateLaserEnd

      public static Coordinate calculateLaserEnd​(Coordinate position, Orientation orientation, Map map, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      This method calculates the end position of laser beam where it needs to be terminated. The method takes consideration whether there is wall or any robot on the path and could be abruptly interrupted.
      Parameters:
      position - either robot position or position of a Laser tile.
      orientation - either robot orientation or orientation of a Laser tile.
      map - map
      players - active players list
      Returns:
      return the end coordinate

    • isWallOnFirstTile

      private static boolean isWallOnFirstTile​(Coordinate position, Orientation orientation, Map map)
      This methods checks whether there is wall or not on current tile. Wall orientation is compared with the orientation of player or laser tile in order to decide whether further traversing of laser beam is allowed or not.
      Parameters:
      position - certain position on a map to be checked
      orientation - orientation of the wall
      map - map
      Returns:
      true when there is wall on the checked tile else false

    • determinePath

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> determinePath​(Coordinate position, Coordinate to, Orientation orientation)
      Helper function that returns a path between (and including) given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      position - Position to start from.
      to - Position at the end of the path.
      orientation - orientation to go to from the starting position.
      Returns:
      A List containing all Coordinates between (and including) position and to or an empty List if to is outside the map or not on the path in given orientation.

    • activateBoardLaser

      public void activateBoardLaser​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> activePlayers)
      This method gets triggered in activation phase.All the Board Lasers are activated at once. Only the first player standing in it's way gets affected.

    • activateRobotLaser

      public void activateRobotLaser​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> activePlayers)
      The method gets triggered in activationPhase. The player on the receiving end gets one spam card as a damage. The Robot can only fire in one direction.

    • determineLaserPaths

      public void determineLaserPaths​(Coordinate laserPos)
      It determines the path through which the lasers traverse. Lasers cannot traverse through wall, antenna and cannot penetrate more than one robot.

    • determineRobotLaserPath

      public void determineRobotLaserPath​(Player player)
      It determines the path for Robot based on its position and direction through which the lasers traverse. Lasers cannot traverse through wall, antenna and cannot penetrate more than one robot.
